title: Spencer Hall on How Long Is Too Long in Vegas and Le'Veon Bell's Boxing Career
description:
Bomani Jones and Spencer Hall discuss how long is TOO long in Las Vegas (1:05)? Plus, why Heat G Tyler Herro isn't going anywhere near Utah (13:40), is it smart for former NFL RB's Le'Veon Bell to try and box Adrian Peterson, and what to make of the criticism surrounding Ravens QB Lamar Jackson (25:32).
